titles.title: Providing for the sine die adjournment of the second session of the One Hundred Fourth Congress.

action.text: Mr. Armey asked unanimous consent to consider as introduced.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Amendment SP 5426 proposed by Senator Lott.
Amendment SP 5426 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate with an amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Mr. Solomon moved that the House agree to the Senate amendment.
The House agree to the Senate amendment without objection.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 10/3/1996--Passed Senate amended. Provides for the sine die adjournment of the House of Representatives and of the Senate on October 2, 3, or 4, 1996.
